snippet.title: Link Bubble: A better way to handle links in Android
snippet.description: There's an app for Android that will completely change the way you interact with links. Jack Wallen introduces you to what should be the default behavior in Android.

snippet.title: 10 apps that make Chromebooks feel like a real desktop
snippet.description: Google Chromebooks are growing in popularity, but the experience can feel foreign to some. Here are some apps to make it feel like home for desktop users.

snippet.title: How Aaron Levie and his childhood friends built Box into a $2 billion business, without stabbing each other in the back
snippet.description: One of the most hotly-anticipated tech IPOs of 2014 is run by four childhood classmates who grew up and built a cloud computing juggernaut during their 20s.

snippet.title: DIY site and online store creation is a snap with LightCMS
snippet.description: No design skills are needed when using LightCMS to create a site or online store for your small or medium-size business.

snippet.title: Rethinking the iPad: A formula to make it useful if you're already savvy on a laptop and smartphone
snippet.description: If you're already highly efficient with a laptop and a smartphone, a tablet can feel awkward and redundant. Here's a way to play to its strengths.

snippet.title: Import Facebook events into your Outlook calendar
snippet.description: Find out how to view special events such as birthdays stored on the Internet in an Outlook calendar on your local system.

snippet.title: Save iOS 7 battery life with these handy tips
snippet.description: Jack Wallen offers some quick tips for preserving battery life in your iOS 7 device.

snippet.title: Capture the web with Chrome screenshot tools
snippet.description: Add screenshots to your training materials with any of these four screenshot tools for Chrome.

snippet.title: A look at OS X Mavericks
snippet.description: Apple's desktop operating system, OS X 10.9 Mavericks, was released on October 22, 2013. Take a look at some of the things you can expect to see in this new Mac OS.

snippet.title: Extend Moto X Active Notifications with DynamicNotifications
snippet.description: Jack Wallen takes a look at Active Notifications and DynamicNotifications, two ways to efficiently communicate with the notification bar on your Android smartphone.
